titles.title: Diagnostic Device Advisory Committee Act
Diagnostic Device Advisory Committee Act
To provide for the establishment of a panel on the real world impact of diagnostic medical devices, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Diagnostic Device Advisory Committee Act
This bill establishes the Real World Impact of Medical Devices Panel to advise the Food and Drug Administration on the real world impact of regulatory decisions relating to medical devices, including diagnostic devices.
